   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to smite-python's documentation!
========================================

smite-python is a simple Python wrapper around Hi-Rez Studios' Smite API. To use it, you must have access to the API.

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
